name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: spaghetti, eggs, cooking cream, parmesan, bacon, onion
description: Boil 100 grams of spaghetti for 8 minutes. In the meantime, cook the bacon in a span for 6 minutes at medium fire. After that, add the chopped onion and cook it until it starts to chage its color. After this add some white wine, cook 2 minutes and then add the cooking cream and cook for 3 more minutes. Now add the boiled spaghetti, mix and right after you stop the fire, add 2 eggs and the parmesan. Job done

name: Boiled eggs with toast
description: Boild the eggs for 3 minutes. In the meantime, add some bread in the toaster for 2 minutes and after that put butter on it.
